title: Arabic Writing Education Material Development and Application for Children with Autism Based on the ADDIE Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic recognition of Arabic alphabet forms and experience with writing instruments
context.additional_context: Provision of digital workbooks and video tutorials considering sensory integration and learning characteristics of children with autism

learning_goals: Through dotted-line tracing practice, learners can reproduce the 28 basic Arabic characters with 80% accuracy
Learners can independently write 20 Arabic words using visual aids (color/shape reinforcement)
Learners can consistently perform writing practice at least three times per week through an LMS-based self-directed learning module
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
